Emergency Call

Hello .
Velika needs you.

Please find me at Tulufan as soon as you see this.

-Raciel

After preventing the Scions of Lok from obtaining the magic of the giants, you receive a message from the Federation.

In the message, Commander Seir ordered you to search for Elleon and his allies who went missing in the Dark Cathedral while hunting for the Scions of Lok.

You found Runha, one of Elleon's companions, waiting for you in the Dark Cathedral, who told you that Elleon and his allies had gone through the Door of Dimension.

You opened the Door of Dimension and set out to follow Elleon into the Cultists' Refuge.

Greetings, . Your stories are well known, even among the federation parliament.

I heard that you even stopped Samael. Who would have thought that man would become a traitor...he has done so much for the federation.

Anyways, I thought the messenger was looking for me, but it was you, .
I'll see you later.

Are you ? If you're not, we have nothing to talk about.

Well, if you're sure you are... Jelena sent word for you. Elleon disappeared while tracking down a lead on the Scions of Lok. Inform Baruch and get moving.

Elleon needs you!

Elleon...missing? I pray he's safe.

Elsine raced toward the Dark Cathedral as soon as she heard. That's not the sort of place an archaeologist should go alone.

Speak with Centurion Orlaith at Crusader Camp. If she's there, he'll know where she's going.

Elsine said she was going to the Cathedral Redoubt and should be there now. As for Elleon, we haven't heard from him since he left.

He was pursuing a priestess. Ackbar? Saskia? What was her name?

Ah, . You must have heard the news, too. Elleon and his team went missing inside the cathedral.

I know there's not much I can do here, but I can't just sit and wait."So let's do something!"

I suppose you're right. It's probably a better idea to get your help. Please go save them.

It's Prefect {@LinkCreature:225#1027#Rendalf} who first reported Elleon missing. He's waiting at Vindicator Redoubt. Find him, and he'll tell you the details.

Go to {@LinkCreature:225#2000#Deirin}. He'll make sure to get you there safe.

You're the famous ? The one who helped capture the traitor Samael, may he rot forever? What an honor! How can I be of service?

Elleon? He took his team through this teleportal we found on the lowest level of this place..."What happened?"

It just stopped working. No one's been able to get through it. Runha and Karus is working on it, but they haven't succeeded yet.

No doubt they could use your help.

You must be !

I'd go through that teleportal right now, but we've got a problem.

After Elleon and his team went through, one of the Scions, {@linkcreature:25#8041#Libtrixas}, sealed the teleportal.

We need to take down {@linkcreature:25#8041#Libtrixas} to get the teleportal working again."Leave it to me."

We'll need "mementos of sacrifice"â€”borne by {@linkcreature:25#8011#Nurkrasid}, {@linkcreature:25#8021#Valursus}, and {@linkcreature:25#8031#Masakrad}.

After collecting all three, activate the {@linkobject:31#Dimensional Hold} at Chapterhouse.
The portal is open! Well done! We must hurry, however. Who knows what trouble the others are in!
